articles.title: Serena Williams turns heads with unique one-legged catsuit during first win at the Australian Open - Daily Mail
articles.description: Serena Williams has turned heads after she wore a brightly coloured one-legged catsuit to her match with Laura Siegemund. Williams won against the German player in less than an hour.
articles.content:
Serena Williams has shown no signs of a shoulder injury as she strolled into the Australian Open second round with a commanding win over German Laura Siegemund.
Donning a brightly-coloured one-legge… [+2013 chars]

articles.title: Critics blast maskless fans and lack of social distancing at Super Bowl 55 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Some 22,000 fans packed into Raymond James Stadium in Tampa on Sunday night to watch the Tampa Bay Buccaneers take on the Kansas City Chiefs.
articles.content:
Critics have blasted fans at the Super Bowl for failing to wear masks properly and disregarding social distancing rules amid fears the game could turn into a Covid super-spreader event.

articles.title: Buccaneers' Tom Brady wins his SEVENTH Super Bowl as Tampa Bay beats Kansas City, 31-9 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers won their second Super Bowl on Sunday with a 31-9 victory over the defending champion Kansas City Chiefs as Tom Brady captured his seventh title.
articles.content:
He's two decades and 346 games into the most successful career in NFL history, but Tom Brady still isn't finished winning Super Bowls.
